ValidationRule.description: GTMS-14863 - When Naics code is present, AEs & ADRs cannot edit Industry
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(NAICS_Code__c)), LEN(NAICS_Code__c)=6, OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"AE"),CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"ADR")), $UserRole.Name <> 'Fleet ADR GS NA MX Team 26', ISCHANGED(Industry) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Industry field cannot be edited when the NAICS code is present. To submit feedback, please go here: https://forms.gle/pVyLwizGmXWgXV6a7
